snippet.title: Roos recruit ruled out for rest of season
snippet.content:
Marley Williams has been ruled out for the rest of the season
NORTH Melbourne defender Marley Williams will miss the rest of the season after being ruled out with a back injury.
The ex-Pie needs surgery and will also be assessed for a shoulder issue.
Sam Wright's year is also over due to the likely possibility of ankle surgery, while star forward Jarrad Waite will miss a fortnight with a calf injury.
More to come
